experience.title: Acting Head Research & Development
experience.description:
As Acting Head of Research & Development (current Head of Research and Development is on Sabbatical) for Trialogue's Knowledge Hub and CharitySA platforms, I help lead the full technology strategy, modernization, and digital transformation initiatives for two of South Africa's largest non-profit information ecosystems. My role combines hands-on technical direction, solution architecture, and leadership of cross-functional teams responsible for delivering scalable, secure, and AI-enhanced platforms.

Technology Strategy & Delivery Governance
• Define and execute the IT roadmap across web, integration, and automation platforms, ensuring alignment with organizational goals and donor expectations.
• Introduced modern SDLC governance, CI/CD pipelines, and DevOps alignment using Azure DevOps, GitHub Actions, and SonarQube to improve delivery cadence, traceability, and audit readiness.
• Lead sprint planning, resource allocation, and Agile ceremonies (Scrum & Kanban hybrids) ensuring consistent release cycles and quality output.

Platform Modernisation & Systems Integration
• Oversaw modernization of legacy PHP and ASP.NET platforms into .NET Core, React, and PostgreSQL ecosystems hosted on Azure App Services.
• Directed the redevelopment of CharitySA's directory and Knowledge Hub portals into API-driven, cloud-native architectures enabling automated data synchronization across microsites.
• Led migration from manual ETL workflows to automated AI-assisted ingestion pipelines, streamlining content validation and indexing.
• Implemented API-based integration between the Knowledge Hub, partner portals, and analytics systems — replacing legacy SFTP/file-driven solutions.
